description: On Mondays, we often like to talk big ideas on Marketplace Tech. So how about turning war-torn Rwanda into tomorrow's tech utopia? A new initiative in the country hopes to do just that with various infrastructure projects as well as bringing computing into the country's classrooms.
title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, October 28, 2013

byline: Will Oremus, Lerato Mbele and David Weinberg
